summary: Four nameless people -- the old man, the woman, the soldier, and the gambler -- journey to a desolate wasteland beyond the limits of an unnamed city.
cast: Bruno Ganz|Jeanne Moreau|Alex Descas|Eustaquio Barjau|Sophie Semin|Jenny Alpha|Evgen Bavcar|Luc Bondy|Sylvain Curial|Arielle Dombasle|Pedro Freixa|Herv√© Telemaque
title: La ausencia
